summary: App being updated to use a defined visual identity (color palette + typography) globally, and replace the global header top image with the provided image/logo.
architectural_notes: Global UI theme: Primary color #1A2B4C (predominant), supporting colors #3E4A59, #F4F7F9, accent #7A918D (use sparingly); prioritize high contrast; avoid neon/vibrant colors (pink/purple).
Typography: Use Inter (sans-serif) globally; titles semibold, subtitles medium, body regular.
Header: Global header uses provided image/logo in place of existing top image.
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Convert the uploaded logo into a square mark with transparent background (Variação do nome completo (1).png > firsty-logo-mark.dim_512x512.png)
- Convert the uploaded logo into a horizontal wordmark with transparent background (Variação do nome completo (1).png > firsty-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png)

existing_features.title: Replace the current logo images in the global header (Topbar) with the new logo asset(s) generated from the uploaded image.

Apply the provided color palette globally using Tailwind/Shadcn theme variables so Deep Indigo (#1A2B4C) is the predominant color, Slate Gray (#3E4A59) is used for body text, Ice White (#F4F7F9) is used for backgrounds, and Sage Green (#7A918D) is used only as an accent; ensure high contrast and avoid vibrant neon/pink/purple colors.
Set Inter as the default sans-serif font across the app and enforce the typography hierarchy: titles semibold, subtitles medium, body regular.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace the image at the top of the global header with the provided image/logo
Apply the specified visual identity globally (primary deep indigo #1A2B4C, support colors, usage rules) and set Inter as the default sans-serif font with defined weight hierarchy
Add the uploaded logo image as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and standardize filenames so they can be referenced by the UI.
